original_text:
They skim past like boats of papyrus,
    like eagles swooping down on their prey.
korean_text: 그 지나가는 것이 빠른 배 같고 먹이에 날아 내리는 독수리와도 같구나

sentences.original_text: They skim past like boats of papyrus,
like eagles swooping down on their prey.
sentences.korean_translation: 독수리가 먹이를 향해 급강하하는 것 같다.
